title: The Other Side of the Heart Is White (2014)
overview: Supporters from all walks of life try to describe what makes so many inhabitants of Rotterdam love the red-and-white of Feyenoord so much. But, as one fan puts it: 'You can't explain it, you just have to feel it.' Made by a supporter for supporters.
storyline: This documentary is about the unconditional love of fans for dutch soccerteam Feyenoord from Rotterdam. Goosebumps guaranteed.
